content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were going to her sisters house to meet up and go celebrate their late mother's birthday with a fun night of dancing and sobriety. we were heading up north on tennyson street from sloan's lake when we witnessed a bar of lights which looked almost like a big jet liner heading towards us right above the treeline. we both remarked that it looked like it may be crashing since it was so big and so low, and then also noticed that none of the lights were blinking like a normal aircraft would, and remarked that it was all a strange bunch of lights. we came up to the top of the hill at 32nd avenue and the craft cleared the treeline and we saw it in full. keep in mind it was a completely clear night with no clouds at all so we really got an excellent look at this thing. it was about 70 feet above us flying slowly above the treeline, and consisted of a white set of lights forming a triangle facing forward, and a red set of lights making a triangle facing backwards, thus giving the craft a diamond shape. as we watched it we noticed 4 main points that told us this was no ordinary aircraft: 1. it made absolutely no sound at all. my girlfriends car engine is relatively quiet, was at a complete stop, and we had the windows rolled down so we know for sure it was completely silent. 2. the craft blacked out stars but the lights on it shouldve illuminated or reflected off of the body, but there was no apparent body. just a black shadow that was at the same shade as the dark in the sky so it was almost impopssible to make out an outline. 3. the lights did not blink. 4. the tail red light shifted with an upward mechanical motion as it flew. neither of us have ever seen anything like this in our lives, and from years of watching the "ghetto bird" police helicopters tear through the night in our neighborhood, we know there should have been sound, blinking lights, and a noticible body shape/outline reflecting the lights even from hundreds of feet away. so we followed this craft as it flew slowly over the trees and houses changing direction from south to east bound towards speer/federal. we follow it for about 5-6 blocks east on 32nd ave where it dissapeared. we continued towards the speer/federal intersection as i hung half my body out of the car window (not too safe i wouldnt reccomend it) to see if it double backed behind us, when i saw a 2nd craft. it was much smaller and consisted of spinning/strobing bluish lights all in a tight pattern flying east towards downtown. the whole cluster of lights were at a tilt and my girlfriend saw it in her side mirror since she was driving. she stopped at the speer and federal intersection where i pulled back in the car to open the door and get out of the car, to which i witnessed the craft i was just watching fly towards downtown at about 100 feet in the air had also completely dissapeared. exactly one week later my girlfriend received a report over cell phone from her neighbor's friend that there were 30 orange lights over wheat ridge. she drove to the area and witnessed one orange orb over 35th and harlan. it dissapeared in her plain sight as she talked to me on the phone. i rushed to her location and she told me she also saw the same previously witnessed "light bar" only it was further away and flew out of sight. i alas did not see any ufo that night, but i did witness two f-16 fighter jets fly over the area a few minutes after i arrived around 9:30 pm. there were also helicopters circling, but with no searchlights on and they were noticably higher up then the usual "ghetto bird" would have been. why were f-16's doing fly overs above wheat ridge at 9:30pm? what were those low flying, unblinking, silent and seemingly cloaked or dissapearing crafts in our neighborhood? we deserve to know.
content.summary: 2 unidentifiable and silent crafts witnessed over north denver which soon dissapeared completely out of thin air.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were enjoying a gorgeous evening on our front porch. it was approx. 7:30pm and just approaching dusk.  i had gotten up to go into the house (walking towards the back door up the driveway) when my husband said ���what is that? come look at this��� i turn back around, looked south (our home faces south) and saw a very large and bright orange/red glowing object. it looked to be heading in a strong north/west direction on a steady path.  i have lived on this same block for 40 years and i am in the path of arriving and departing planes from metro airport.  i can tell you that there have been only a couple of times when i���ve seen a plane that low flying in an east or west direction. we continued to stand in awe and must have asked each other five times ���what is that?���  i want to say it looked like something large was on fire(but there were no "flames"). its diameter was approx. two to three times the size of our brightest stars. it seemed so very low and i was fully expecting to see what it was. it was not an airplane i know that for sure. the sky was clear and beautiful and there was no wind.

i ran inside to get my binoculars and when i came back out it was still in sight.  there are a lot of trees so my field of view was becoming limited.  i have a powerful pair of binoculars and it is often hard to find objects right away because of this (plus i was nervous).  i had to keep taking them down to estimate the position because it was still traveling on its steady path.   at one of these times, my husband gasped and said ���it stopped glowing; now it���s black.���   i had only maybe 30 seconds left of viewing and i still couldn���t bring it into view with the binoculars so i just stood there staring at the black object until it left our view.  after the fire faded, the object appeared to be a lot higher than i had originally thought. it was so far up there that i could not discern the size or shape of it. did it ascend that fast?? i can't say for sure. the glow was so big and bright it orginally looked really low. it didn't make sense. after the glow went away, the black object did look flat but it was so far up there that it was hard to tell with the naked eye.

it was still dusk so it was light enough to know what it was not.  it was not a lantern, hot air balloon, or airplane. while glowing, there was nothing attached to the top or bottom, it looked just like a glowing object.   aircraft lights are not huge, orange, or glowing.  even at this time of day aircraft lights are not even visible yet.   wind does not usually carry things westerly as far as i know.   i am more than curious as to what this was.
content.summary: Orange-red glowing

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving home 7:38 pm september 28, 2011 on ga hwy 278 just crossing ga hwy 120 when i finally took the pictuce with my cell phone. i originally noticed the strange cloud formation after we crossed ga hwy 92 on 278. a few miles later i noticed two glowing objects. one was rectangular with not as sharp geometry more in the cloud and the other was smaller but a its horizontal and vertical lines were perfect. i began to watch the objects because of their shapes in the odd color cloud. they seemed stationary and had no blinking lights. i lost the object after about 10 minutes after crossing ga hwy 61 due to lighting and line of sight.  

my wife was driving and 16 year old daughter sitting in the back saw it also but they were not as courious myself.

after looking closer at the image on my computer there is also a sphere in the cloud formation.

did anyone else notice something strange in the western geogria sky that night.
content.summary: We saw two stationary rectangular object  motionless in an odd color cloud formation while driving home.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and his best friend were putting away materials after building stairs on our back door when they yelled into the house "get out here now" and went back out into the driveway.  i observed two of these orbs, the top one just looked like a planet or star and didn't move other than kind of flicker or twinkle. the bottom one moved to the left, hovered for a minute then just disappeared, like someone turned out the light. the other one remained without moving and the three of us decided it must be a planet/star, but then it disappeared the same way the other one had. before i got out there, my husband and his friend observed three of them turn in sync in an arc before two disappeared. these were not meteors, planes, chinese lanterns, etc. i have no idea what they could have been.
content.summary: 4 glowing red orang balls in eastern sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down highway 407 with my parents and i looked out at the sky. it is near pearson airport, so i saw some aircraft. i also saw some birds flying away from a point. i saw a large, hovering, metallic object. it made no audible noise and hovered until it was out of site.
content.summary: Driving down a highway with my parents when i see a strange metallic object hovering in a cloudless sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife witnessed 2 glowing orbs in the sky while she was driving down our street on se sherrett st. she has an incredible video that she shot from her iphone, through her windshield. the lights spun around each other and then descended to the ground where they then went behind some trees and out of view. she is very reluctant to share this experience, so i am writing this for her. the video is 34 seconds long, and it is incredible.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Wife filmed 2 orbs of light through her car window flying above, then the spun around and shot down to ground and went behind trees.

content.detailedDescription: I was at football practice in raytown (little blue trace ball fields) and there were these weird lights in the east that asended up from the tree line and flew north across the sky changing their path as they got farther away from the tree line. at the time, it was almost ignored until the coach noticed them and said, "look, a ufo!" i was very suprised at the time but they disappeared behind the taller trees before i could tell what it was.
content.summary: The ufo was made up of  about 5 white lights in a circle with a red light in the middle.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on 294 northbound about 3 miles south of ohare oasis and seen 2 reddish/orange circular orbs hovering about 500 ft altitude to the left of me as i approached them. i immediately pulled over on the left side shoulder of expressway to get a better look at the objects. they were literally just on the other side of the expressway. they were perfect circles and they were like no other light source i've encountered before. the objects didn't emit any type of glare whatsoever, and it was a dull light, but clearly visible is the only way i can explain it. they hovered in the same spot for about a minute then took off at truely incredible speeds going west. it was an awe inspiring experience!!! i also didn't see any craft they were attached to, but they stayed same distance apart from each other as they took off, making it seem like they were connected to each other. hopefully others had seen these orbs too.
content.summary: 2 reddish/orange circular orbs hovering then took off

content.detailedDescription:
Oct. 7,  2011
guessing about 9 pm

last night standing beside my pickup in the driveway facing south.   nearly  over head at about a 80 degree angle i saw small pinpoints of light like stars.  first light went east for about two seconds then went out.   then the second light from the same starting point went west for about two seconds and went out.  then another point of light appeared went south for about two seconds and went out.  then another point of light appeared went north for about two seconds also went out.  it looked like if you joined them all from their starting points that they formed a plus sign in their flight paths.
content.summary: Starlike object or objects make a plus sign  high in the sky

content.detailedDescription: On oct.7,my mom and me were coming home from my sisters. when we came across brownwood rd . i noticed something in the sky. i asked my mom what is that she looked and she said right away that is a ufo. we pulled of the road and watched it for at leasted 5 to 10 minutes. it was long way longer than a airplane and it had lights. i looking at mom when i first noticed it and i just new it was a ufo.It was very long and green,blue and white lights were under it. it was moving very slow. i thought it was very cool this is the first one i have seen and i beleive they are here and they live among us. we just wish they would reveal themselves to us. they have not causted any problems that we are awear of.  the ufo just disapeared .
content.summary: A long object with lights moving around the bottom. moving very slow. just over the tree tops.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard of my residence putting the dog out for the evening. i tunned facing southeast and noticed 3 orangish lights in there sky. they were moving in a northwest direction and when i first noticed them they were low in the sky and seemed to gain altitude as they went directly over me. they went from the first sight area until they reached a point past me and appeared to go up in the sky. this freaked me a little as it did not appear to be a plane and they made no noise when they were over me. appx. five minutes later a second set of the same lights flew over me following the same direction and in the same pattern. two lights in front and one behind. the lights in front seemed to moved back and forth to some degree and then they would fall back so that it appeared they were directly across from each other in the sky. now having observed a second set of lights i was really excited and anxious and my brain was jumping around as to what these could be. it was something i never seen before. about ten minutes later a third set moved across the area in again the same pattern and direction. as the third set approached i called my wife out of the house and she had exactly the same reaction that i did. she had never seen anything like it and it was really frreaky. she too wondered what they could have been. they all appeaared to go up in the sky and out of sight as they moved away from us. the whole event took appx. 15-20 minutes. i called the local police dept. and inquired if they had any reports of strange lights in the sky, as i figured that someone else had to have seen these things. they reported that they had not had any reports and asked me if it was a plane that i had seen. i told them that it was not a plane and that i didn't know what it was. they asked me if i wanted the police to come out and i said no, that there was nothing to see  or do at the time of the call.
content.summary: I observed 3 sets of 3 lights all flying in the same direction and in the same pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:25am on october 2, 2011 i was walking to my vehicle at the san diego airport terminal 2, when i looked to the west and saw a bright object in the sky which happened to be in the flight path of departing air traffic.  at first i thought it was the reflection of the sun off of an american airlines md-80(polished aluminum) however the object did not move.  then i thought that it could be an aircraft from the miramar air show that was going on that day, but again, the object didn't move.  i then retrieved my binoculars from my vehicle and looked at the object with magnification. 

with binoculars, my initial thought was that it was a pair of balloons perhaps released from a picnic or party at the ntc park just west of the airport, however the object/s did not move as balloons do in the wind.  this is to say, that their horizontal and vertical location did not vary, however the object/s were spinning at perhaps 15rpm around each other with a fairly regular and consistent rotation.  imagine two spheres attached and rotating around each other.  i ruled out balloons when i saw that even with good binoculars, the objects still had fuzzy edges, and at that apparent distance they were similar in size, if not larger, to aircraft (ie 737's) when banking north or south on their ascent out of san diego.

i watched the object/s with my naked eye and then with binoculars for about 2-3min, then when i pulled my binoculars down to look again with the naked eye, the object was gone.  it hadn't moved or gone behind the clouds, it was simply not in the sky.  i continued to scan the sky, and saw no trace of the object.  if it had been balloons that burst, i would have seen one of the two still there, or floating down etc, but this object/s simply disappeared.  

on my way home, i drove through the park to look for parties or picnics with gold balloons, and saw no picnics or parties with any balloons.

when at home, i got online and downloaded the air traffic control recordings for that time, and at one point during my sighting, atc notifies an airplane in their frequency that they have an unknown object to their right at 1600ft(24:25min on the recording).  but that is the only mention of anything suspicious or remotely out of the ordinary.

i am still not sure what i witnessed, if it was anything at all.
content.summary: Gold/copper spheres over point loma, san diego

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on morrish rd. in swartz creek in between grand blanc rd. and hill rd. i saw 2 orange glowing lights in the sky.  they were probably 500 ft in the air.  they were obviously not any sort of known aircraft, so i pulled over.  one of the lights quickly decended down and then went back upwards.  they both traveled to the north at a very fast pace and were soon out of visual sight.
content.summary: 2 orange glowing lights that hovered around and then sped off

content.detailedDescription: I saw 4 ufo's not moving in the air for at least five minutes. just hovering there. oct 8th 2011 3:30pm in knoxville, tn above my house. clear sky and they were silver. i went inside tried to find camera came back out and 3 were gone. the last one started moving very slow and when i tried to look in my binoculars to see it and then couldn't see it so 5 seconds later when i pulled them from my eyes it was gone. i do not know who to go to or to see if anyone else around me seen the same thing. i tried to take a picture with my phone but you cant really see anything but 3 of them and they just look like dots in the sky. please write back thanks
content.summary: Knoxville, tn 4 ufos 10min

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch after finishing light chores in the yard about 5:30 pm near downtown cartersville,ga on 10-08-11. i then witnessed an object in west/northwest sky coming directly at my angle but from very far away. this is the flight path of incoming flights to atlanta, so i did not think much of it until it got a bit closer and it started to resemble an atmospheric balloon, and then it appeared to separate. this object was at a very high altitude, but i could tell it was not an airplane. i ran to my kitchen to fetch my binoculars used for bird watching, and as i returned i searched for the objects. what first appeared as one balloon-looking object was now two with a third trailing. they all appeared round and bright with the first two objects one right above the other and the third trailing far behind. the front two objects floated above one another with each pulling ahead of the other as they all changed paths from southeast to south/southwest. their entire movement seemed very slow across the sky, but at what appeared to be very high altitude,the slow speed seemed relative to height.  as i continued to follow their path, i thought i have to get my camera, but they just disappeared. it was a cloudless day and it just blew my mind to see them disappear. i have never had an encounter like this before. their path took them about 1/4 the distance across the western horizon in about 4 1/2 minutes.
content.summary: Three objects in western sky at 5:30 pm est viewed from home in cartersville, ga.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sky-watching, meditating after class on a beautiful day.  there wasn't a cloud in the sky.  at 1:00 i decided i was going inside to do some homework.  i took one last look at the sky and noticed a planet-like object high up, almost directly above (slightly north-west of me).  this was strange since i had been watching the sky above me for almost an hour and i would have noticed it if it was there.  i got out my binoculars and saw a curious orange-ish orb floating motionless in the sky.  i called my roommate(1) and he came outside.  after his eyes adjusted he saw it, and his first reaction was to ask if it was "a planet or star."  when i gave him the binoculars he described it as slightly morphing like a cell or an ameba.  my roommate(1) called our other roommate(2) out, and he was shocked.  roommate(2) said it might have had a tail, i thought i might have seen the same but it was hard to tell.  he also said that it looked silver to the naked eye, and orange through the binoculars.  roommate(1) said it was more white-ish than orange, and slightly translucent.  to me it just looked like an orange orb, self-illuminating and curiously still.  after 25 minutes i was on the phone with the colorado mufon advisor, and someone who works in the building came out to tell me that an employee's uncle is the international mufon director (which was quite a coincidence) and i got distracted for a couple of seconds.  when i looked back it was gone.  it had traveled due-east, but remarkably slowly.

i would like to note that earlier in my sky-watching session, there was one faint cloud that floated west at about the same speed.  my first thought was that the object could have been a weather balloon, but further research has made it less likely that it was.  so far i have not been able to identify what my roommates and i saw that day.

i have attached a photo, but i think the object was too high to be captured by my cell-phone camera.
content.summary: Orange orb appeared high in the sky. watched it for 25 mins w/ binoculars, resembled an ameba.  slowly went west-east then till we lost sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on i-35 otober 5,2011 around 8:00 pm, after i passed ne antioch rd. i notice something hovering over. it seem like it was by liberty,mo, it was a little bigger than a helicopter with white bright beams of light on the bottom. at first i thought it was a ufo, then i looked again at the object and saw a red blinking light in the middle so i thought ufos do not have red lights,so i just assumed it was a helicopter. then i got off the highway and lost track of the object. then i heard on the radio about the ufo sightings.
content.summary: I wasdriving home oct. 5,2011

content.detailedDescription: I reported this last week but now hav video and hope someone can tell what this is
content.shape: Circle,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: I been seeing this every night since last week

content.detailedDescription: I saw that same thing oct. 5th in asheville, north carolina, that was on a wednesday night, my mother, little sister and me, where going to my sisters home in asheville, and there was this light in the sky hovering over the highway, we drove right under it. it was the size of a stealth plane, was shape in a pyramid, diamond, triangle shape, with a very bright light at the nose and red , green lights on the wings, the back had flames coming out the rear, but hovered in air and may no nose, everyone seen it, who where driving on interstate 26, near longshaw road exit. it was only hovering less then 100 from the ground, at tree top level over a﻿ the frenh broad river in asheville, i saw the craft very clearly, it was solid black with blue markings all over that glowed, my mom said maybe it's a plane and i said planes don't hover, then said maybe it's a cellphone tower or radio tower, with a huge spot light on it, but once we drove under it, she shut up for a second and said maybe it's a helicopter, and said if it was a chopper, we would heard it before seen it.
content.summary: Ufo in asheville, north carolina. oct.5, 2011

content.detailedDescription: I have many years of tapes with different things on them started off with a few lights zipping around the sky then more of these lights started to appear more often making shapes in the sky also have a tape with a voice on it sounds like someone narrating my tape didn't hear it while taping and talking to my father while i was taping but when played back you hear a mans voice say (they brought medals not of this world they drew diagrams and maps of what they saw) also my cousin and i saw a big red looking fire ball  real big had to be at least 25' high and same around circle come through my yard stopped by my house i ran in to get the camera and it was gone when i came out   the same night is when we taped movement in the sky and the voice on tape  please i would like to share the tapes with some one who can help me understand what is going on why me am i sapost to share this with the world or keep this stuff to my self i still see the orbs in the sky for some reason they follow me haven't been able to tape them anymore i believe they had something to do with braking my camera also i have a tape that looks like a cresent moon when you look closer you can see windows on this craft on it's side look like somethings are looking out and moving around in this craft   please would love to show the right people these films not ready for the whole world to hear me freaking out on tape but would love for the right people to view all of these amazing sites i have on tape would like to know is there a connection between them and me would love to learn more
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Boomerang,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cone,   Chevron,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Many years on tape of different sighting

content.detailedDescription: At first we (my wife and i) thought is was another planet as jupiter is in the eastern night sky at the time. this "apparent" planet appeared as a bright light for a few minutes then it suddenly moved in a very direct and straight line eastward until is was gone.
content.summary: It looked like another planet in the night sky, similar to jupiter.

content.detailedDescription: Last night in about 10:30 pm i witnessed something in the sky that put me and my wife in shock.  over the atlantic shores of st. augustine an unknown bright object in a boomerang shape with orange and red lights were drifting in the sky for 45 minutes and then stop and turn into a large white bright ball with a light tale. the object did not make any noise but the intensity of light changed every 10 seconds. so far i did not see any reports of such object from nasa, jpl or any other witness.  the entire event was recorded and it will be available for the public tonight.
content.summary: Ufo or asteroid? over saint augustine

content.detailedDescription:
Unfortunately my story would be a movie and if i attempt to tell it, it would probably take as long.  so i will only comment on this creature.
  i had been hearing clicking noises lately every time i came out of the front door, but i could never tell where they were comming from. so on the night of august 4, 2011 at 9:35 pm i took camera in hand and decided to stand out front and listen for the noise again.  when i heard it i snapped this picture.  there seems to be lots of them here, but this one seems to be the only one that has tried to communicate.
content.summary: A bluish/green small humanoid like creature riding on craft with appendages

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i observed a star-like object in the morning sky at approximately 9:10 am, oct 8, 2011. it moved one direction then abruptly changed direction several time before instantly coming to a complete stop where it appeared to hover. the object did this several times.

it was very high in the sky (approx. 60 degree off the horizon) and was bright like a star. it then moved very quickly across the sky and came to a complete stop where it again hovered.  after it hovered for a few seconds, it disappeared.

as an estimation of the speed of the object, we saw a high flying commercial airplane a few minutes after seeing the object.  we estimated that the object was traveling 4-5 times faster than the commercial airplane.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I observed a star-like object in the morning sky. it moved one direction then changed; direction instantly. it moved very fast across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Husband told me the night of 10/3 about a very bright star he had seen last week of sept 2011. night of 10/6/11 while on my deck with the dogs, i saw in the east the brightest star i had ever seen. called husband out on deck to look. he said was the same one he had seen earlier. i tried that night in googling bright stars with no luck. night of 10/7/11, between 7;30 and 8pm, dark outside, while out on deck, no sight of the star. husband thought too many clouds. about 8;30pm was out again with dogs on deck and there was the same light in sky, east of my home, seeming to be over odessa, mo. very very bright. was below the cloud cover. called husband to the deck to look. about 30 min later i went out again to look at it. while watching it, i started noticing it made jerky movements. up/down side to side. then hover. called husband out to watch that too. at this point i also could see what appeared to be 3 other clusters of lights only further away. two sets more to the west of my home and one more to the north east, north of i-70. the one north would also make jerk movements. i came in and called the highway patrol. the lady that answered, apparently the dispatcher, listened to what i had to say and then informed me that there had been over 80 reports the past couple weeks. when i told her how it was stationary then with jerky movements she said oh her husband had seen the exact same thing a couple nights earlier and described it the exact same way i had to her. i called a friend in grain valley mo and had her go outside. she also witnessed it with her daughter.No noise ever came from the one closest to me. it hovered then moved as if scanning. it appeared as the night progressed to move higher in the sky than in the first 2 hours of watching it. from it's original points due east of me at first sight, by 2 am was more overhead my home moving towards the west. i had also asked the lady from the highway patrol to send out a car to chapel hill on z highway to get a good view but don't know if that happened. this was not a plane that could sit stationary in the sky like this object did. i did happen to notice a jet, flying from the west to the east about 9:30 or so fly above the main object and the jet was above the clouds. i know this because i could barely make out the lights and contrail through the cloud cover. this object i viewed was not close to clouds. at 2am. i finally quit watching and tried to sleep. while watching it hover then move, gave me excited but nervous feeling. not knowing what i was watching. feeling like it was scanning made me feel invaded. i tried to take pictures with my camera and my phone camera but i don't know if i was successful. i also asked my friend in grain valley to try and get pictures but have not heard if she could. i am not to good with electronics. i could sketch roughly what i saw. this object was so bright it looked either like it had extensions, or very bright beams coming off the perimeter of object like a vivid starburst but seemed to me more like extensions.
content.summary: Not in sky at 8pm, then 8:30 ish, it appeared in same spot as 10/6/11. watched it stay stationary then jerky up/down side to side move.Watched till 2 am slowly move towards west

content.detailedDescription: As i came out of a store i scanned the night sky. in the west not too far away, i saw two bright white light (huge) heading towards where i was. i ran for my camera in my car and then it was above me, low enough that i could see a distinctive triangular shape with three red lights blinking and a row of red lights in the center. it moved slowly overhead as i filmed it the best i could. i do not recall any noise. i did state on my video that i have never seen a "plane" like that if it was a plane. it was quite large and the shape is what made me feel that it was not a plane. planes move much faster than this was moving, especially if they are directly above.  the lights blinking underneath were huge, the main three being in a triangle.
content.summary: Triangular shape ufo with three large red blinking light and two large white

content.detailedDescription:
Driving west on rt i-80 i observed seven ships in formation around lake hopatcong (i think it could have been something else near the lake). they remained stationary in a formation (obviously in communication with each other) two helicopters approached them from the east and then turned and went back on their course and disappeared. i observed this formation for approximately 35 minutes as i approached the lake from the east and watched them in a formation around the lake. two of the ships, which just looked like stars but way too close to the horizon soundless followed west right in front of my car - not sure of the distance at which they travelled in front but they maintained the same distance all along as if they were following my car although i sensed no foreboding or weird vibrations. they then seemed to disappear from view but just faded out /went out of phase in a shimmering kind of way. two cars next to me were also watching it and pointing and looking and actually looked at me because i opened my sunroof and slowed down so i could watch them.

someone should check if anyone else makes a report also where the helicopters were from i saw no markings and i could clearly tell the difference between the ships and the helicopters because the ships hovered/remained fixed in a "geosynchronous" position whereas the helicopters were moving across the sky as well as making noise.
content.summary: Formation around lake hopatcong seven ships

content.detailedDescription:
I and 7 other employees that work with me were in our company van. we were driving back to lenexa kansas from lees summit /blue springs missouri area.
all of a sudden by the royals statium we see lights hovering above the high way i 70 we caught it on video on one of the employees phones.
it looked like it was about 5oo ft from the ground and in the shape of a circle but as we got closer it seemed to be a triangular shape .
there was no noise comming from the ufo . it had blue and white lights flashing all over . the lights were so bright it almost blinded me driving . it really shook us all up we could not belive what we had seen.
content.summary: 6 lights or so in sky hovering above the high way then got a closer look and it was a trangular shape

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I was smokeing on the back deck petting the family cat just looking around at other peoples back yards and the sky enjoying the quiet and from behind me.From over the roof a light coming from the north e like on a rail to the south w and vanished.Like neon gold either in disc or cresent shape could not tell!
content.summary: Golden yelowish discish shape

content.detailedDescription: Was in my backyard to throw out trash looked up at a bright lit star or planet looking object and from it came a triangle shape object no lights but was reflecting lights from below heading out from inland camarillo area west over our house out to ocean. it was flying low at first but as it continued over head reached a high elevation and was able to see possible navy plain or county plane fly below its path. both my fiance and i where watching so i know i'm not crazy. typically clouds move in the opposite direction. this object seemed to hoover over us at one point and we both asked ourselves if it could see us. weird!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: triangular, changing, hard to see, no lights scene on ship
